markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Onyx Panther](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2988)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=709" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 266 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 7 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This beautiful black pebble is sculpted into a stylized panther shape. When you activate it, use a Sneak action with a +1 item bonus to the check. You can move your full Speed (instead of half) on this Sneak action and any others you take this turn.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Onyx Panther

text: <title level="1" right="Item 2" pfs="Standard" > Onyx Panther Source GM Core pg. 266 2.0 Price 7 gp Usage affixed to armor Activate Single Action (concentrate) --- This beautiful black pebble is sculpted into a stylized panther shape. When you activate it, use a Sneak action with a +1 item bonus to the check. You can move your full Speed (instead of half) on this Sneak action and any others you take this turn.
